Articles.Content:
Hi,

I made myself my own skybox, that I have exported from Space Engine, but there are seams on the Milky Way, as you can see here:

(Quite noticable on the right of the Science window)

Looking at the textures I thought "these are obviously not correctly orientated". Nope, rotating the texture doesn't change anything for me.

Can anyone help me please?

Here's the texture: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/98670603/KSP/SE_Skybox.zip
